item.description:
Please join us for our next meeting at the Reading Public Library on Sept. 8, 2009. We will meet in the small conference room on the other side of the building as we did last time. I think the space is nicer and I don't have to set up the tables and chairs which is a plus.

I'd like to discuss with the group the direction future meetings should take. Would you be interested in monthly speakers, do you like the format of sharing our stories and journeys?
Come prepared to share with the group what you would prefer. If you cannot come to the meeting and wish to e-mail your ideas please do so.

I am still actively looking for a new meeting room in the Reading area but it has to be very
close by for me to actually use it. I generally am finishing up with clients a half hour before our meetings. Stoneham, Reading, Wakefield, or N. Reading would work probably. If anyone knows of a place let me know.

thanks BETSY

Please understand I pay for the room and the meetup costs each month and I am not meeting those expenses through donations at this time. I don't want to charge for the meetings but I might have to do this soon. The charge would be $3 if I do. I know many of you are in dire straights financially so I will put off doing this another month or so.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia September Meetup
